title: Tab
description: Explore how to create tabbed navigation and content sections.

meta.title: LNGRZUI - Tab Documentation
meta.keywords: component library, reusable components, documentation, application development, UI toolkit

content.overview-desc: Tabs provide a convenient way to organize and navigate between different sections or views within a web application. This page introduces the Tab component and explains how to create tab-based navigation interfaces. It covers tab configuration, content rendering, and event handling, enabling developers to implement effective tabbed interfaces.
content.how-to-desc: Import the Tab component, define the tabs and their associated content, handle tab selection events, and update the displayed content based on the selected tab.
